div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1722 Egypt, before 1967 Burial: 46-45 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 169 AR Ptolemy II: 1 tetradr. (as Svoronos 732) Ptolemy IX Soter II: 2 tetradr. (as Sv. 1671) Ptolemy X Alexander I: 1 tetradr. (as Sv. 1679) Ptolemy XII Auletes: 158 tetradr. (as Sv. 1856-7, 1860-6, 1869, 1836-7, 1839) Cleopatra VII: 7 tetradr. (as Sv. 1818-9) Disposition: unknown Information from R. Hazzard, Toronto
